summary: Comprehensive testing of SpellQuest Cove Phase 1.1 - World Map, Level-mode Quest, VFX, Pet Evolution system. All major features working correctly with no critical issues found.
passed_tests: Root redirect to /map.html working
Map page loads with correct title 'Echo Harbor'
21 map nodes render correctly (20 levels + 1 boss)
Level 1 available, levels 2-20 and boss locked on fresh start
Map node clicking sets localStorage and navigates to quest.html
Level mode shows correct title 'Level X' (not 'Quest Battle')
Enemy variety working - Static Wisp (1-4), Echo Glitch (5-8)
HP scaling correct - Level 1: 20HP, Level 5: 28HP
Level 1 word 'cat' gameplay and victory working
Victory overlay shows 'Level cleared!' with correct buttons
Level completion updates localStorage correctly
Map shows completed level with checkmark, unlocks next level
Crystal system working - 1 per word + 5 bonus = 6 total
Pet evolution working - locked -> egg (25+) -> hatched (75+)
VFX system working - vfx-hit for correct, vfx-flash-red for incorrect
Crystal persistence across all pages (hub, map, quest)
Hub Quest Mode button navigates to map (not quest)
Spell Helper functionality working with letter chips
All navigation buttons working correctly
No JavaScript console errors on any page
